title: How to Store Pictures on Google Drive

steps.title: Go to Google Drive.
steps.content: Go to Google Drive. Using any web browser on your computer, visit the Google Drive page .

steps.title: Sign in.
steps.content: Sign in. Under the Sign In box, enter your Gmail email address and password. Click the “Sign in” button to proceed. Upon logging, you will be brought to the main drive or directory. All your folders and files on Google Drive can be accessed from here.

steps.title: Select pictures to upload.
steps.content: Select pictures to upload. Click the “New” button on the top of the left panel menu, then select “File upload.” Your computer’s file explorer will open. Navigate through your folders and go to the one that contains the pictures you want to store on Google Drive. Click on all the pictures you want to upload.

steps.title: Upload pictures.
steps.content: Upload pictures. Click the “Open” or “Upload” button on the file explorer once you’ve selected all the photos. The selected pictures will then be uploaded to Google Drive.

steps.title: Launch Google Drive.
steps.content: Launch Google Drive. Look for the Google Drive app on your iOS device and tap on it. You will be brought to the main drive or directory. All your folders and files on Google Drive can be accessed from here.

steps.title: Tap the plus sign button on the top right corner of the screen.
steps.content: Tap the plus sign button on the top right corner of the screen. The “Add to My Drive” menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap “Upload Photos or Videos” in the Add to My Drive menu.
steps.content: Tap “Upload Photos or Videos” in the Add to My Drive menu. Google Drive will access your mobile gallery.

steps.title: Select pictures to upload.
steps.content: Select pictures to upload. Go to the album or folder that contains the pictures you want to store on Google Drive. Tap on all the pictures you want to upload. The selected pictures will be marked with a check.

steps.title: Upload pictures.
steps.content: Upload pictures. Tap the check button on the top right corner of the menu box to upload the selected pictures to Google Drive.

steps.title: Launch Google Drive.
steps.content: Launch Google Drive. Look for the Google Drive app on your Android device and tap on it. You will be brought to the main drive or directory. All your folders and files on Google Drive can be accessed from here.

steps.title: View your mobile gallery.
steps.content: View your mobile gallery. Tap the rounded square with a plus sign on the screen. The New menu will appear. Tap “Upload” from here, then, if prompted, select “Gallery.” Your mobile gallery will be brought up, and you can see all your pictures from there. You can navigate through the albums and folders as you normally will.

steps.title: Upload a picture.
steps.content: Upload a picture. Go to the album or folder that contains the picture you want to store on Google Drive, and tap on it. The selected picture will be uploaded to Google Drive.
